comments: Very easy class if you keep up with the suggested homeworks. Exams are easy and if you do well on them there is no final
Awful at explaining things and the answers he used to correct the tests were incorrect. Very easy grader though.
Very chill guy, treats eveybody like colleagues. His tests are fair and allows open books and open minds. Be sure to study mortgages, it\'s his favorite topic.
It\'s because of professors like him that it\'s worth spending the money to go to a private college.
Terrible professor. Not a nice guy. Completely out of touch with reality. Avoid him at all cost.
